Python package for use with BioContext MCP servers to enable LLM tool use.

## Documentation

- [Installation](installation.md) - Installation instructions and requirements
- [Use Cases](use_cases.md) - Examples of connecting to MCP servers and creating servers from OpenAPI specs
- [Configuration](configuration.md) - Configuration options and development setup
- [Registry Usage](registry_usage.md) - Guide for using the BioContext Registry
- [API Reference](modules.md) - Detailed API documentation
